name: Drink it up
description:
This is a game inspired by the monkey who stole the wine.

It is a puzzle trivia game that can be played by people of any age and will hopefully help you get through the boredom and bring you joy.

Next, I will describe how the game is played.

1. You can control the movement of your character by using "W,A,S,D".

2. Follow the buttons and press them to trigger events.

3. Left mouse button and long click on the "drink" button to start drinking

4. The game is won when the wine is finished, however, if the monkey is still drinking when the light reaches it, the game is over
